018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static java.lang.System.err;
021import static java.lang.System.out;
022import static java.util.Arrays.asList;
023import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableMap;
024import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_STRING;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_String_ARRAY;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.splitString;
030
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.util.ArrayList;
033import java.util.Collection;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.TreeMap;
037import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
038
039import org.apiguardian.api.API;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ProgramClass;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.ApplicationError;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.LambdaContainerException;
044
045/**
046 *  Executes the {@code JavaDoc} tool with a bunch of default parameters.
047 *
048 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: Starter.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.0.5
051 *
052 *
053 *  @deprecated This program was replaced by
054 *      {@link JavadocStarter}.
055 */
056@ProgramClass
057@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Starter.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
058@API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
059@Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
060public final class Starter
061{
062        /*------------*\
063    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
064        \*------------*/
065    /**
066     *  The tool provider.
067     */
068    private final ToolProvider m_ToolProvider;
069
070        /*------------------------*\
071    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
072        \*------------------------*/
073    /**
074     *  The default arguments.<br>
075     *  <br>The map is immutable.
076     */
077    private static final Map<String,String> m_DefaultArguments;
078
079    /**
080     *  The arguments that can be replaced by those on the command line.<br>
081     *  <br>The key is the argument name, the value is the arguments value; it
082     *  will never be empty.<br>
083     *  <br>The map as such is immutable.
084     */
085    private static final Map<String,String> m_ReplaceableArguments;
086
087    /**
088     *  The tags and taglets.
089     */
090    private static final List<String> m_Tags;
091
092    static
093    {
094        final Map<String,String> defaultArguments = new TreeMap<>();
095        defaultArguments.put( "-author", null );
096        defaultArguments.put( "-charset", "\"UTF-8\"" );
097        defaultArguments.put( "-docfilessubdirs", null );
098        defaultArguments.put( "-encoding", "UTF-8" );
099        defaultArguments.put( "--expand-requires", "all" );
100        defaultArguments.put( "--frames", null );
101        defaultArguments.put( "-html5", null );
102        defaultArguments.put( "-javafx", null );
103        defaultArguments.put( "-keywords", null );
104        defaultArguments.put( "-link", "https://doc.oracle.com/javase/15/docs/api/" );
105        defaultArguments.put( "-linksource", null );
106        defaultArguments.put( "-serialwarn", null );
107        defaultArguments.put( "-source", "10" );
108        defaultArguments.put( "-sourcetab", "4" );
109        defaultArguments.put( "-splitindex", null );
110        defaultArguments.put( "-use", null );
111        defaultArguments.put( "-version", null );
112        defaultArguments.put( "-J-Duser.language=en", null );
113        /*
114         * We cannot use Map.copyOf() here because some values are null.
115         */
116        m_DefaultArguments = unmodifiableMap( defaultArguments );
117
118        final Map<String,String> replaceableArguments = new TreeMap<>();
119        replaceableArguments.put( "-d", "./doc" );
120        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-members", "private" );
121        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-module-contents", "all" );
122        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-packages", "all" );
123        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-types", "private" );
124        replaceableArguments.put( "-locale", "en_GB" );
125        m_ReplaceableArguments = Map.copyOf( replaceableArguments );
126
127        m_Tags = List.of
128        (
129            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.AnchorTaglet",
130            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.HRefTaglet",
131            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.UnderlineTaglet",
132            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.NoteTaglet",
133            "-tag param",
134            "-tag return",
135            "-tag throws",
136            "-tag author",
137            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.AuthorTaglet",
138            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.ThanksTaglet",
139            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.ModifiedTaglet",
140            "-tag version",
141            "-tag since",
142            "-tag see",
143            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.InspiredTaglet",
144            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.UmlGraphLinkTaglet",
145            "-taglet org.tquadrat.javadoc.ToDoTaglet"
146        );
147    }
148
149        /*--------------*\
150    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
151        \*--------------*/
152    /**
153     *  Creates a new {@code Starter} instance.
154     *
155     *  @param  toolProvider    The tool provider.
156     */
157    private Starter( final ToolProvider toolProvider )
158    {
159        m_ToolProvider = toolProvider;
160    }   //  Starter()
161
162        /*---------*\
163    ====** Methods **==========================================================
164        \*---------*/
165    /**
166     *  Does the program's work.
167     *
168     *  @param  cmdLineArgs The command line arguments.
169     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when determine the project
170     *      location.
171     */
172    public final void execute( final Collection<String> cmdLineArgs ) throws IOException
173    {
174        final List<String> localArgs = new ArrayList<>();
175
176        final Map<String,String> replaceableArguments = new TreeMap<>( m_ReplaceableArguments );
177        for( final var arg : cmdLineArgs ) replaceableArguments.remove( arg );
178
179        m_DefaultArguments.forEach( (k,v) ->
180        {
181            localArgs.add( k );
182            if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( v ) ) localArgs.add( v );
183        } );
184
185        replaceableArguments.forEach( (k,v) ->
186        {
187            localArgs.add( k );
188            localArgs.add( v );
189        } );
190
191        m_Tags.stream()
192            .map( t -> splitString( t, ' ' ) )
193            .map( List::of )
194            .forEach( localArgs::addAll );
195
196        localArgs.addAll( cmdLineArgs );
197
198        //---* Show the command line *-----------------------------------------
199        out.println( localArgs.stream().collect( joining( " ", "javadoc ", EMPTY_STRING ) ) );
200
201        //---* Execute the tool *----------------------------------------------
202        m_ToolProvider.run( out, err, localArgs.toArray( EMPTY_String_ARRAY ) );
203    }   //  execute()
204
205    /**
206     *  The program entry point.
207     *
208     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
209     */
210    public static void main( final String... args )
211    {
212        try
213        {
214            ToolProvider.findFirst( "javadoc" )
215                .ifPresentOrElse( t ->
216                {
217                    final var application = new Starter( t );
218                    try
219                    {
220                        application.execute( asList( args ) );
221                    }
222                    catch( final IOException e )
223                    {
224                        throw new LambdaContainerException( e );
225                    }
226                },
227                () -> { throw new ApplicationError( "Cannot find Tool 'javadoc'" ); } );
228        }
229        catch( final LambdaContainerException e )
230        {
231            e.getCause().printStackTrace( err );
232        }
233        catch( final Throwable t )
234        {
235            //---* Handle any previously unhandled exceptions *----------------
236            t.printStackTrace( err );
237        }
238    }   //  main()
239}
240//  class Starter
241
242/*
243 *  End of File
244 */
